p: The CoVs belong to the order Nidovirales, family Coronaviridae, and the subfamily Coronavirinae. They are genetically categorized into four important genera: the Alphacoronavirus, Betacoronavirus, Gammacoronavirus, and Deltacoronavirus. The former two genera typically infect mammals, whereas the latter two predominantly infect birds [ 9, 17- 18].
